name: Valis III
summary: The side-scrolling bishojo action game series "Valis", which was first released in the 80s and gained popularity, celebrated its 35th anniversary in December 2021. "Valis III" offers a selection of visual cutscenes as well as three playable characters, each with unique fighting styles and magic. The game is equipped with a viewing mode that allows you to enjoy the gems of Valis sound and beautiful visual scenes! In addition, many other elements allow you to enjoy Valis to the fullest, such as a function that allows you to save and load anywhere and a "rewind" function that allows you to go back and redo any mistakes you make!
